member.name: P:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CodeCompletion.Lookup.LookupWindowManager.IsExternalDocumentChangeAllowed
member.summary: If this flag is set, any document change doesn't cancel code completion

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CodeCompletion.Lookup.LookupWindowsSharedCache.myCachedPhysicalFontSize
member.summary: NOTE: why we track physical size + Avalon font rather than just GDI+ font? That's because the control has DPI for painting and Font and DPI for RenderParams, and these do not necessarily update in sync, so it might so happen that the cache would be refitted for the new font too early and a few requsts with the old font might be made. To avoid this inconsistency, we enforce the Avalon font strictly (there cannot be more than one really), but track pixel size ad hoc and reset the cache when it changes.

member.name: P:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CodeCompletion.Lookup.VirtualLookupWindow.AutoActivate
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the control should be activated initially when it's shown. The typical implementation for a form is to return a negative of this value from the override.

member.name: T:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit
member.summary: An edit-like control for placing on the dialog boxes that picks a type name from a tree or completion list.

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CommitCompletionListInputString
member.summary: Immediately commits the to the completion lists's model. Wired to the deferred binding when the completion list menu is lazy-created.

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListExecuteSelectedItem
member.summary: Exec sel menu item, if any. Returns exec success flag ().

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListSelectNextItem
member.summary: Selects the next item in the completion drop-down list, eg when up/down arrows are used in the edit box.

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.IsCompletionListVisible
member.summary: Gets whether we've ruled out that the completion list should be visible at the moment. This means is and the 's are not empty (and the model exists, in the first place).

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.myEvtUpdateTextBeforeCaret
member.summary: As we can't (so it seems) get the event of caret movement in the edit box, we'd udpate it every so often. Probably the caret position can't change without a Windows message on the control, so we'd apply the change after each message, with a small delay needed just to group multiple consequent messages together. GEvent is better than BeginInvoke because the latter adds to the messages itself and cannot guarantee all fo the dependent messages go thru before it executes.

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CaretPosition
member.summary: Gives out the current caret position in the edit box, or the selection start position.

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowMode
member.summary: Whether the completion list is allowed to be shown at the moment. Other filters could apply (eg will not be actually visible if there are no items).

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets the settings that define the behavior of the picker, like what it picks and which functionality is available. Can be set only once.

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the editbox the user is typing.

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.TextBeforeCaret
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the editbox the user is typing, up to the current caret position or the selection start. Could be used as the completion prefix.

member.name: M:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.ExecuteCompletionListItem(JetBrains.Application.UI.Controls.JetPopupMenu.Detail.JetPopupMenuItem)
member.summary: If menu is shown, selects the given item and applies its text.

member.name: M:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListHide(JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModeTransition)
member.summary: Hides the completion list, either the soft or the hard way. Modifies based on its present value and the .

member.name: M:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShow(JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModeTransition)
member.summary: Shows the completion list, either the soft or the hard way. Modifies based on its present value and the . Eg a soft-show won't actually show if currently in mode.
Implements menu lazy-creation. Does nothing if already created.
member.param: Disconnects from lazy creation, making sure it actually runs only once.

member.name: M:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.OnCompletionOrPickerTextApplied
member.summary: Called after: • User executes an item in the completion list and some new text is applied to the editbox. • User executes an item in the picker tree drop-down and some text is applied to the editbox. Normally, selects the new text and sets focus to the editbox.

member.summary: Raises the event.

member.summary: Raises the event.

member.name: T:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModeTransition
member.summary: Flag for transitioning between .

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModeTransition.Soft
member.summary: Switches softly, cannot break . This is for handling implicit activities.

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModeTransition.Hard
member.summary: Switches forcibly, always transitions to the desired state. Must be done on explicit user actions only.

member.name: T:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModes
member.summary: Whether the completion list is allowed to be shown at the moment. Other filters could apply (eg will not be actually visible if there are no items).

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModes.Show
member.summary: The completion list could be visible if other factors (like items>0) are met.

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModes.HideSoft
member.summary: The completion list has been hidden indeliberately, and should transition to when there's an excuse.

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.CompletionPicker.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModes.HideHard
member.summary: The completion list has been focibly hidden. Should not show again unless explicitly requested by the user.

member.summary: Overrides element painters for the root tree list control. Delegates everything as much as possible to the original element painters (which correctly use the current LAF etc etc), but overrides the resize grip which must match the scrollbars in color (scroll bar track in our case).

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.Hyperlink.HyperlinkManager.HyperlinkInfo.ProvidersActiveWhenCreated
member.summary: The providers which were active at the moment this hyperlink were painted. This includes the modifier key combination which triggered them.

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.Hyperlink.HyperlinkManager.State.Ready
member.summary: A normal state. The manager tracks mouse/keys and highlights navigation targets under the cursor.

member.name: F:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Core.Hyperlink.HyperlinkManager.State.Steady
member.Summary: A mouse button is pressed and the manager is waiting for the mouse up event to perform navigation.

summary.para: False start. A mouse button is still pressed, but we should not navigate on mouse up (see RSRP-467688, RSRP-467053).
Navigation is disabled, an existing hyperlink is removed and new hyperlinks are not created until all mouse buttons are released.
